Name: sea coconut
hai di ye
coco de mer
Other: fu ye zi 復椰子﹐(double coconut)
hai ye zi 海椰子, (sea cocomut)
hai ye zi 海椰子, (sea cocomut)
da shi lu 大實櫚，(large seed palm)
ju zi zong 巨籽棕 , (large seed palm)

Geography: Lodoicea maldivica (sea coconut/double coconut): Praslin and Curieuse islands of Seychelles.
The sea coconut (hai di ye) sold in Guangdong today is not the African sea coconuts but are the fruit of sugar palm from Thailand and other south east Asian countries.
Maladies Treated: Slices of Semen Lodoiceae maldivicae (African hai di ye) used in soup: treating chronic cough.
Slices of Semen Lodoiceae maldivicae (African hai di ye) used in soup: arresting bleeding.
Samples of Formulae: Folk recipe for chronic cough: Composition: Hai Di Ye (sea coconut) 30 g; Xing Ren (apricot kernel) 9 g; Sheng Jiang (fresh ginger) 2 slices; Wu Hua Guo (fig) 6 pieces; Chen Pi (aged tangerine peel) 6 g; lean pork 1 kilogram. Preparation: Simmer for 4 hours to make into soup.
Contraindications: Almost all of the sea coconut (hai di ye) sold in Hong Kong and Guangdong today is not the African sea coconut (Lodoicea) but the fruit of sugar palm (Borassus flabellifer Linn.) from Thailand and other South East Asian countries; the fruit is a little smaller than a regular coconut and much smaller than the African sea coconut. For medical purposes, they cannot be used as a substitute.
Research: Modern Research: identification of sea coconut herb, see http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12569825
Notes:
No information about African hai di ye has been found in classical Chinese medical texts. After searching classical Chinese pharmacopeias, no record of sea coconut as medicinal was found.
Tao Hongjing in Shennong Bencao Jing Jizhu (AD 500) wrote: “Again, physicians do not recognize drugs, they only listen to market people. Market people also do not discriminate thoroughly; all are entrusted to the households that collect and deliver. What is transmitted, practiced and manufactured—the authenticity and quality are all unfathomable.” The modern situation of sea coconut is as Tao Hongjing said: physicians have not seen the true African sea coconut; they listen to shop owners, who rely on wholesalers, who rely on gatherers; thus the fruit of sugar palm is treated as sea coconut.
Description: The double coconut (sea coconut) is shaped like two coconuts joined together and is the world’s largest seed; its weight can reach 20–30 kilograms. The fruit of sugar palm is single and smaller, and does not join together.

Gmel.) Pers.Lodoicea seychellarum Poir. （syn.)Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕kaite iyashiPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕ Pron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕hoi2 dai2 ye4Other Chinese Names:別名﹕fu ye zi 復椰子﹐(double coconut)hai ye zi 海椰子, (sea cocomut)，da shi lu 大實櫚，(large seed palm)ju zi zong 巨籽棕 , (large seed palm)Common Name:外文名﹕French: coco-de merEnglish: sea coconut, double coconutDistribution:產地﹕Praslin and Curieuse islands of Seychelles. The sea coconut (hai di ye) sold in Guangdong today is not the African sea coconuts but are the fruit of sugar palm from Thailand and other south east Asian countries. The shape of sea coconuts (double coconut) is like two coconut joining together and its weight can reach 20 to 30 kilograms while the fruit of sugar palm are much smaller and do not join together.復椰子原產 非洲塞舌爾國的兩個海島﹕ Praslin 與 Curieuse ﹐ 目前廣東市面上出售的乾的或的濕海底椰，是糖棕的果實，主要生長在 東南亞，属於熱帶植物﹐與非洲的 復椰子不同。復椰子形狀像兩顆椰子連 在一起; 是世界最大的種子﹔ 重量可達20 ~ 30 公斤。糖 棕的果實只是單顆生長的。Properties characteristics)﹕性味﹕ Channels  meridians) entered: 歸經﹕lung肺Medical functions:藥理﹕ hypoglycemic effect [1]降低血糖作用【1】Actions & Indications:主治﹕Slices of Semen Lodoiceae maldivicae (African hai di ye) is being used in making soup for treating chronic cough and for arresting bleeding.復椰子果肉 煮湯飲服，有治療久咳和止血的功效。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ Dosage:用量﹕about 30 g30克左右 。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕Folk recipe:For Chronic cough: hai di ye 30 g, xing ren 9 g, fresh ginger  2 slices, dry or fresh figs 6 pieces, chen pi 6 g, lean pork 1 kilo gram. Simmer for 4 hours to make into soup.廣東民間常用方﹕治久咳嗽﹕海底椰 30 克﹐杏 仁 9 克﹐ 生 薑 2  片﹐ 無花果6枚﹐陳 皮 6 克﹐ 瘦肉2 公 斤。慢火煮四小時﹐ 作湯。Modern Research:現代研究﹕identification of sea coconut herb, see http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12569825Cautions:禁忌﹕Almost all of the sea coconut (hai di ye) sold in Hong Kong and Guangdong today is not the African sea coconuts but are the fruit of sugar palm (Borassus flabellifer Linn;)  from Thailand and other south east Asian countries. The size of the fruit of sugar palm is a little smaller than a regular coconut and much much smaller than the sea coconut of Africa. For medical purposes, they can not be used as substitute.目前香港與 廣東市面上出售的乾的或的濕海底椰，幾乎全是是糖棕(Borassus flabellifer Linn;) 的果實，主要生長在 東南亞，與非洲的 復椰子不同, 其體積比平常的椰子略小； 比非洲海底椰小很多。药用不能代替非洲海底椰。 No information about African hai di ye has been found in classical Chinese medical text . [1] http://www.idb.hr/diabetologia/09no4-1.pdf 查通中國古典藥典﹐ 沒有發現有海底椰藥用之記載。 南北朝陶弘景所著「神農本草經集注」（AD500年 ）提出當時的中藥亂象：「又且醫不識藥，惟聽市人。市人又不辨究，皆委採送之家。傳習造作 ，真偽好惡，並皆莫測」 現代的海底椰情形也如南北朝陶弘 景所說。醫師不沒見過真的非洲海底椰，唯有聽藥店的老闆，而老闆靠中藥批發商。批發商靠採藥者。所以糖棕的果實當作海底椰。Search this siteProblems with website? Name: da ji
Biological: Knoxia valerianoides Thorel ex Pitard (紅芽大戟)

Geography: Euphorbia pekinensis A. Rupr.: mainly produced in Jiangsu, Sichuan, Jiangxi, Guangxi (China).
Knoxia valerianoides Thorel ex Pitard: mainly produced in Guangxi, Guangdong, Yunnan, Guizhou (China).
Maladies Treated: Edema (水腫). Can be taken internally.
Scrofula (瘰疬; tuberculosis of lymph nodes).
Carbuncles and swelling due to toxin (癰疽腫毒). Can be applied externally by washing the affected area with a decoction or taken internally.
Water edema with distention, urine and stool not passing, with an excess presentation (形證俱實).
Accumulation of phlegm-fluid with fullness of the chest and diaphragm and dull hypochondriac pain (痰飲積聚，胸膈脹滿，脅肋隱痛).
Pleural effusion (胸水) in the context of strong water-draining action.
Medical Function: Drains water and expels retained fluids (瀉水逐飲).
Reduces swelling and dissipates nodules (消腫散結).
Reduces swelling and resolves toxin (消腫解毒).
Has a comparatively strong water-draining action; used for water edema, abdominal distention, ascites, and pleural effusion (瀉水之力較大，用於水腫、腹脹、腹水、胸水).
Dosage:
Internal: 1.5–3 g in decoction; 1 g per time in powder form.
External: appropriate amount; wash the affected area with a decoction.
Contraindications:
Contraindicated in pregnancy.
Incompatible with yuan hua (Yuan Hua/Genkwa flower), gan cao (Gan Cao/licorice), and hai zao (Hai Zao/sargassum, seaweed).
If toxicity occurs, use shi chang pu (Shi Chang Pu/sweet flag, Acorus) as an antidote.

Root (Euphorbia pekinensis): Euphobia A, B, C (大戟色素體 A, B, C)

Four anthraquinone compounds: 3-hydroxy bajiquinone (3-羥基巴戟醌); 1,3,5,6-tetrahydroxy-2-methylanthraquinone; huci-aldehyde (虎刺醛); methyl isorubiadin (甲基異茜草素); and 1,3,5-trihydroxy-2-methyl-6-methoxyanthraquinone (紅大戟素, hong da ji su).
Two organic acids: syringic acid (丁香酸) and another organic acid with undetermined structure.

(京大戟)Knoxia valerianoides Thorel ex Pitard (紅 芽大戟)Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕taigekiPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕taegukPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕daai6 gik1Other Names:別名﹕xia ma xian下馬仙， qiao 蕎， qiong ju 邛巨， long fu cao 龍虎草，qiu tou shi zi cao  九頭獅子草 ，jing da ji 京大戟， jiang jun cao 將軍草， pen zhang cao 膨脹草， tian pin yi zhi xiang 天平一枝香， po shui long 迫水龍，da mao er yan 大貓兒眼， huang hua da ji 黃花大戟 ，huang ya da ji 黃芽大戟 ，qian ceng ta 千層塔， shou shan hu 搜山虎， chuan shan hu 穿山虎。Common Name:英文名﹕Peking spurge rootDistribution:產地﹕Euphorbia pekinensis A Rupr. is mainly produced in Jiangsu, Sichuan, Jiangxi, Guangxi provinces of China.Knoxia valerianoides Thorel ex Pitard is mainly produced in Guangxi, Guangdong, Yunnan, Guizhou provinces of China.京大戟： 主產於江蘇、四川、江西、廣西等地。紅芽大戟：主產於廣西、廣東、雲南、貴州等地。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter, sweet, very cold and toxic.味甘，苦，大寒，有毒。  Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕kidney, large intestine, lung腎，大腸，肺。Medical functions:藥理﹕  Actions & Indications:主治﹕For edema, ascites, retention of phlegm, tuberculosis of lymph nodes.Can be taken internally or applied externally.治水腫，水臌，痰飲，瘰疬，癰疽腫毒。1,瀉水逐飲：主治水腫脹滿，二便不通，形証俱實者。也可用於痰飲積聚，胸膈脹滿，脅肋隱痛。 2,消腫散結：可用於癰腫瘡毒及痰火瘰癘， 內服。 本品瀉水之力較大，用於水腫、腹脹、腹水、胸水。消腫解毒 用於癰瘡腫毒，可外敷內服。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕Root contains triterpene, alkaloids, free anthraquinone, euphobon, euphobia A, B, C. Also contain rubber, resin, 4 types of anthraquinone, and 2 kinds of organic acid: syringic acid and another organic acid whose chemical formula has not been determined.Knoxia valerianoides contains ursolic acid and β-Sitosterol.主要成分：新鮮葉含維生素C。根含三萜、生物鹼、游離蒽醌類及給合性蒽醌類，大戟甙 ，大戟色素體A,B,C等。另含樹膠、樹脂，含4種蒽 醌化合物為3 -羥基巴戟醌；1，3，5，6-四羥基-2-甲基蒽醌、虎刺醛、甲基異茜草素及1，3，5-三羥基-2-甲基-6-甲氧基蒽醌(紅 大戟素)；尚有2種有機酸：丁香酸和另一結構未定的有機酸。紅芽大戟屬含熊果酸(Ursolic acid)(1)，麥胚固醇(β-Sitosterol)。Dosage:用 量﹕Internal use: 1.5 to 3 g in decoction. 1 g per time in powder form.External use: use appropriate amount. Wash affected area with decoction.1.5－3g。散劑每次1g。外用適量，煎水熏洗。Samples of formulae:處方舉 例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Not to use during pregnancy. Not compatible with yuan hua, gan cao. Antidote: shi chang pu.反芫 花，甘 草， 海藻。如中毒用石 菖蒲解之。孕婦忌服。[1] http://www.mandarintools.com/worddict.html Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading  in progress Click here for inquiry  Copyright Notice 按此看關於 版 權問題List of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryToxicity of Some HerbsSide Effect of Some HerbsHerbs that can be toxic to kidneysTraditional Chinese MedicineTCM DiagnosisSamples of FormulaeAcupuncturecopy right 版權所 有Qigong (chi kung)Prescribed Drug DictionaryEmail our web master for  your suggestion (not for inquiry)Biochemistry DictionaryGeneral Online LibraryQigong classesLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianSearchQigong classes HomeWeather Report    DisclaimerLast update: Sept 4, 2015, :9:45 p.m. LAHSearch this site

Name: shi zhu yu
食茱萸
Botanical: Fagara ailanthoides (Sieb. & Zucc.) Engl. & Prantl. (椿葉花椒)
Fagara ailanthoides (S. et Z.) Engl. var. ailanthoides
Fagara ailanthoides (Sieb. & Zucc.) Engl. var. pubescens Hatusima
Zanthoxylum ailanthoides Sieb. & Zucc. var. inerme Rehd. & Wils.
Other name: zhe tong pi 浙桐皮《浙江藥用植物志》
gu ding chai 鼓丁柴《福建藥物志》
mu man tian xing 木滿天星《廣西本草選邊》
ci cong mou 刺江某（台灣）
chou ye hua jiao 樗葉花椒

Maladies Treated: Root and stems: injuries from impacts (跌打損傷).
Root and stems: rheumatism / rheumatoid arthritis (風濕).
Root and stems: common cold (感冒).
Young leaves: cold abdomen with pain (心腹冷痛).
Medical Function: Resin contained in the bark, especially in that of the roots: antitussive, carminative, and powerfully stimulant. [2]
Young leaves: ridding of parasites (殺蟲).
Dosage:
For oral decoction: 1.5 g to 3 g; may also be made into pills and powders.
For external application: crush and apply to the affected area or wash with the decoction.
Contraindications:
Not to use in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat (陰虛火旺者忌服).
Avoid with Zi Shi Ying (紫石英).
Ben Cao Tu Jing (本草圖經): "不可多食，多食沖眼，兼又脫髮。"

Engl. & Prantl.  (椿葉花椒)Fagara ailanthoides (S. et Z.) Engl. var. ailanthoides Fagara ailanthoides (Sieb. & Zucc.) Engl. var. pubescens Hatusima Zanthoxylum ailanthoides sieb. & Zucc. var. inerme Rehd. & wils. Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕karasuzanshiyouPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕ Pron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕zik6 zyu1 jyu4Other Names:別名﹕niao bu da 鳥不踏﹐yue jiao 越椒﹐wu shan jiao 烏山椒﹐hong ci cong 紅刺蔥，zhe tong pi 浙桐皮《浙江藥用植物志》，gu ding chai 鼓丁柴《福建藥物志》，mu man tian xing木滿天星《廣西本草選邊》，ci cong 刺蔥，ci cong mou 刺江某（台灣），chou ye hua jiao 樗葉花椒。Common Name:英文名﹕ Distribution:產地﹕Anhui, Zhejiang, Fujian, Guangdong, Taiwan provinces of China.安徽，浙江，福建，廣東，贵州，臺湾，等地。Properties (characteristics)﹕性味﹕acrid, bitter.辛，苦。Channels  (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕Medical functions:藥理﹕ The resin contained in the bark, and especially in that of the roots, isantitussive, carminative, and powerfully stimulant. [2]樹皮内的樹脂，尤其是根部的樹脂有止咳，排屁，與很强的刺激作用。Actions & Indications:主治﹕ Root and stems are being used in injuries from impacts, rheumatoidarthritis, influenza and malaria. Fruit are being used from improving digestion,constipation, heat strokes. The young leaves are for ridding of parasites,arresting pain, for cold abdomen with pain.根﹐莖主治跌打損傷﹐風濕﹐感冒, 瘧疾﹐糖尿；果實為健胃劑，可治便秘﹐消化不良﹐中暑；嫩葉具殺蟲﹐止痛﹐治心腹冷痛。.Chemical ingredients:化學成份[1]﹕樹皮含光葉花椒鹼 (nitidine)，茵芋鹼 (skimmianine)，樟葉木防己鹼 (laurifoline)，木蘭鹼 (magnoflorine)，果實含花椒內酯 (xanthyletin)，魯望桔內酯 (luvangetin)，橙皮油內酯 (aurapten)，繖形花內酯 (umbelliferone)，樗葉花椒鹼 (ailanthoidine)，光葉花椒酮鹼 (oxynitidine)，去-N-丙酮基白屈菜紅鹼 (des-N-methylchelerythrine)，N-異丁基 (2E,4E)-2,4-十四碳二醯胺 (N-isobutyl- (2E,4E)-2,4-tetradecadienanide)，柄果酯素 (pluviatiol-3,3-dimethylallyl ether)，β-穀甾醇 (β-sitosterol)，β-香樹脂醇 (β-amyrin)。[1]Dosage:用量﹕For use in decoction for taking orally: 1.5 g to 3 g.For external application: smash and apply to affected area or wash with decoction.煎湯，1.5～3 克；或入丸、散。外用：搗敷或煎水洗。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Not to use in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat.陰虛火旺者忌服。畏紫石英。《本草圖經》："不可多食，多食沖眼，兼又脫髮。 [1] http://www.spec-g.com.tw/twherb/HerbDetail.aspx?HID=76[2] http://www.pfaf.org/database/plants.php?Zanthoxylum+nitidum  Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告  A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading  in progress Click here for inquiry  Copyright Notice 按此看關於版權問題List of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryToxicity of Some Herbs  Side Effect of Some Herbs  Herbs that can be toxic to kidneysTraditional Chinese MedicineTCM DiagnosisSamples of FormulaeAcupuncturecopy right 版權所有Qigong  (chi kung)Prescribed Drug DictionaryEmail our web master for  your suggestion  (not for inquiry)Biochemistry DictionaryGeneral Online LibraryQigong classesLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianSearchQigong classes HomeWeather Report    DisclaimerLast update: July 30, 2009, 4:55 p.m. LAHSearch this site

Geography: Distributed in Zhejiang, Fujian, Guangdong, Taiwan.
Mainly produced in Fujian, Zhejiang, and Taiwan.
Maladies Treated: Tendons and vessels spasm (筋脈拘攣).
Cold and pain in the epigastrium and abdomen (脘腹冷痛).
Samples of Formulae:
Postpartum arthritis (產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛)
Name of formula: Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction)
Application: Pain in the body; red, hot, and swelling in joints.
Composition (grams): Ren Dong Teng (Honeysuckle vine) 30 g, Wei Ling Xian (Clematis root) 9 g, Qing Feng Teng (Sinomenium vine) 15 g, Hai Feng Teng (Kadsura pepper stems) 15 g, Luo Shi Teng (Star jasmine vine) 15 g, Fang Ji (Stephania root) 9 g, Sang Zhi (Mulberry twig) 30 g, Zhui Di Feng (Chasing Ground Wind herb) 9 g.
Preparation: Boil with water and use as tea.
Composition (original units): 忍冬藤1兩，威靈仙3錢，青風藤5錢，海風藤5錢，絡石藤5錢，防己3錢，桑枝1兩，追地風3錢。

Bronchitis (支氣管炎)
Ingredients and preparation: Hai Feng Teng (Kadsura pepper stems) 2 兩 and Zhui Di Feng (Chasing Ground Wind herb) 2 兩. Soak in 1 斤 white wine for 1 week. Take twice daily, 10 mL each time, morning and evening on an empty stomach. Do not warm when taking; otherwise it loses effect. Heart disease patients and pregnant women should not take it; suspend during common cold and menstruation. (《全展選編�內科》)
Contraindications:
Use with caution in cases of yinxu with fire (陰虚火旺慎服). [1]
For the bronchitis medicinal wine: do not warm when taking; otherwise it loses effect. Heart disease patients and pregnant women should not take it; suspend during common cold and menstruation.
Research:
Effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis: Hai feng teng increased myocardial nutritional blood flow of mice, reduced myocardial ischemia collateral vascular resistance of dogs, and showed a good effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis. [1][2]

Anti-inflammation and endotoxin-related effects: Hai feng teng extract antagonized the rat intravenous endotoxin-induced decline in arterial blood pressure and reduced endotoxemia pulmonary edema caused by increased pulmonary vascular wall permeability. These effects may be related to antagonism of PAF (platelet activating factor) attributed to the chemical ingredient futoenone. Hai feng teng is suggested as worthy of trying to treat endotoxin shock. [1][2][3]

Denudatin-B showed potent PAF antagonistic activity in a 3H-PAF receptor binding assay. [3]

Also contains: Four macrophyllin-type dicyclo[3,2,1]octane new lignanoids (recently separated)

References: [1] Zhong Hua Ben Cao (中華本草).
Original Text:
hai feng teng, Complementary and Alternative Healing UniversityComplementary and Alternative Healing University

    pm. LAH  hai feng teng
       海風藤  
      (in English and Chinese  中英文)
Translated 
by: Joe Hing kwok ChuPharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Caulis Piperis kdsuraeBotanical name:拉丁生物學名﹕Piper kadsura (Choisy) OhwiPron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕kaifutoPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕haepungdeong
Pron. in Cantonese::粵音﹕hoi2 fung1 tang4Other Names:別名﹕man keng xiang滿坑香lao teng老藤da feng teng大風藤yan hu jiao岩胡椒ba yan xiang巴岩香 feng teng 風藤Common Name:英文名﹕kadsura pepper stemsDistribution:產地﹕It is distributed in Zhejiang, Fujian, Guangdong, Taiwan. Mainly produced in Fujian, Zhejiang, and Taiwan.分佈於浙江、福建、廣東、台灣等地。主產福建、浙江及台灣等地。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕acrid, bitter, slightly warm.辛，苦，微溫。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕heart, liver, kidney.心，肝，腎。Medical functions:藥理﹕ Effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis:Hai feng teng can increase myocardial nutritional blood flow of mice, and reduce myocardial ischemia collateral vascular resistance of dogs, and has a good effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis.[1][2]Anti-inflammation effect:[2][3]  Hai feng teng extract can antagonize the rat intravenous endotoxin-induced decline in arterial blood pressure, and reduce endotoxemia pulmonary edema caused by increased pulmonary vascular wall permeability. Such effects of hai feng teng may be related to its antagonistic effect on PAF (platelet activating factor) by its chemical ingredient of futoenone  The traditional Chinese medicine, hai feng teng, is a worthy for trying to treat endotoxin shock. [1]. Denudatin-B showed potent PAF antagonistic activity in 3H-PAF receptor binding assay[3] 海風藤能增加小鼠心肌營養血流量，降低狗心肌缺血區側枝血管阻力，對冠心病和腦血栓有較好的療效。海風藤提取物可以拮抗大鼠靜脈注射內毒素引起的動脈血壓下降，並能減輕內毒素血症對肺血管壁通透性增高引起的肺水腫。海風藤的這種效應可能與其中風藤烯酮與PAF的拮抗作用有關。PAF（血小板激活因子）提示海風藤是一種值得嘗試的治療內毒素休克的中藥。【1】化驗結果玉蘭脂B表現出強有力的拮抗3H-PAF之受體而降低PAF（血小板激活因子）之 活性。[3]Actions & Indications:主治﹕for getting rid of rheumatism, clearing  meridians, correcting qi flow (li qi), arresting pain. Mainly used in wind cold type of arthritis, pain in joints, spastic muscles, cold and pain in abdomen, edema.祛風濕；通經絡；理氣；止痛。主風寒濕痺；肢節疼痛；筋脈拘攣；脘腹冷痛；水腫Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ Stocks and leaves contain:莖、葉含:Futoxide細葉青蔞藤索Futoenone細葉青蔞藤烯酮Futoquinol細葉青蔞藤酮醇Futoamide細葉青蔞藤酷胺(風藤酰胺)β-Sitosterolβ-谷甾醇Stigmasterol豆甾醇Evaporating oil:揮發油:α-PineneΑ-蒎烯β-Pineneβ--蒎烯Limonene檸檬烯Sabinene香檜烯Camphene莰烯Isoasarone異細辛醚Futoxide長穗巴豆素，futoenone風藤烯酮kadsurenon海風藤酮licarin里卡靈Denudatin B玉蘭脂Bfutoquinol風藤醌醇α and β-pineneα-及β-蒎烯Cedrene香松烯Isoasarone異細辛醚Also contains:尚含:β-sitosterolβ-谷甾醇stigmasterol豆甾醇recently 4 macrophyllin type of dicyclo [3,2,1] octane type of new lignanoids have been separated.近年又分得4個大葉素型雙環[3,2,1]辛烷類新木脂素。Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕6 -12 gSamples of formulae:處方舉例﹕For postpartum arthritis [2]Name of Formula: Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction)Application: Pain in the body, red, hot and swelling in jointsComposition: ren dong teng 30 g, wei ling xian 9 g, qing feng teng 15 g, hai feng teng 15 g, luo shi teng 15 g, fang ji 9 g, sang zhi 30 g, zhui di feng 9 g.Boil with water and use as tea.   方名:  清熱除痺湯 （劉奉伍婦科經驗）功效:  清熱散濕，疏風活血。 主治:  產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛。組成: 忍冬藤1兩，威靈仙
 3錢，青風藤 5錢，海風藤 5錢，絡石藤 5
            錢，防己 3
            錢，桑枝1兩，追地風 3
            錢。   支氣管炎：海風藤、追地風各二兩。用白酒一斤，浸泡一周。日服二次，每次10毫升，早晚空腹服。服時不可加溫，否則失效。心臟病人及孕婦忌服，感冒及月經期暫停服。(《全展選編�內科》)
Toxicity & Cautions:
毒素與禁忌﹕Those with condition of yinxu with fire should use with care.陰虚火旺慎服。 [1]
       Zhong Hua Ben Cao
       中華本草[2] Bioorg Med Chem Lett. 2010 May 15;20(10):3186-7.[3]

Name: yin chai hu
銀柴胡
Other name: yin zhou chai hu 銀州柴胡
yin xia chai hu 銀夏柴胡
shan ma da chai gen 山馬踏菜根

Maladies Treated: infantile consumption/gan heat due to infantile food stagnation or accumulation of worms, with fever of ganji, abdominal distension, thirst, emaciation, dry and scorched hair
parasite in digestive tract with bulging abdomen, thirst, weight loss, dry and wilted hair
Medical Function: Often used together with Ji Nei Jin (鸡内金, chicken gizzard lining), Shi Jun Zi (使君子, Quisqualis fruit), and Dang Shen (党参, Codonopsis root), in order to achieve the effects of eliminating food accumulation, killing parasites, strengthening the spleen, and treating gan (malnutrition-related) syndrome.
Samples of Formulae:
Co-administration guidance: Commonly combined with Ji Nei Jin (Chicken Gizzard Lining), Shi Jun Zi (Quisqualis fruit), and Dang Shen (Codonopsis root) to jointly achieve eliminating food retention and killing parasites, strengthening the Spleen and treating gan (infantile malnutrition).

Qing Gan Jie Yu Yi Yin Shen Shi Tang (Guangxi Journal of Traditional Chinese Medicine): Functions and indications: clears the Liver and relieves constraint, strengthens the Spleen and drains dampness. Indicated for Liver channel constrained heat and dampness accumulating in the Spleen. Composition: Bai Ju Hua (White Chrysanthemum flower) 9g, Mu Zei (Shavegrass / Horsetail herb) 9g, Chan Tui (Cicada molting) 9g, Yin Chai Hu (Stellaria root) 9g, Qiang Huo (Notopterygium root) 9g, Sheng Di Huang (Rehmannia root, raw) 9g, Nu Zhen Zi (Ligustrum fruit) 9g, Cang Zhu (Atractylodes rhizome) 9g, Bai Zhu (Atractylodes macrocephala rhizome) 9g, Fang Feng (Saposhnikovia root) 9g, Chi Shao (Red peony root) 6g, Tu Si Zi (Cuscuta seed) 15g, Gan Cao (Licorice root) 3g. Preparation and administration: decoct in water; one dose daily, taken twice per day.
Contraindications: Those who are having cold or influenza and those with condition of xue xu (blood deficient) should not use this herb.
Chemical Ingredients: 6-C-galactopyranosyl-isoscutellerein (漢黃芩素及6-C-半乳糖基異野黃芩素)
Original Text:
yin chai hu, Complementary and Alternative Healing University

yin chai hu 銀柴胡  
        (in Enlish and Chinese 中英文)
 
 by: 
        Joe Hing kwok Chu



Pharmaceutical name:
英文藥名﹕

 Radix 
            Stellariae dichotomae



Botanical name:
學名﹕

Stellaria 
            dichotoma L. var．lan-ceolata Bunge



Pron. in Japanese:
日語發音﹕

 ginshiyuu saiko (銀州柴胡 )



Pron. in Korean:
韓語發音﹕

 





Pron. 
in Cantonese:
粵音﹕

 ngan4 caai4 wu4



Other Names:
別名﹕

yin zhou chai hu 銀州柴胡，yin 
            hu 銀胡，yin xia chai hu 銀夏柴胡，shan 
            cai gen 山菜根，shan ma da chai gen 山馬踏菜根，niu 
            du gen 牛肚根，sha shen er 沙參兒，bai 
            gen zi 白根子，tu shen 土參



Common Name:
英文名﹕

 



Distribution:
產地﹕

mainly produced in Shaanxi, 
            Gansu, Ningxia and Inner Mongolia.主產陝西﹐
            甘肅﹐寧夏及内蒙古。




Properties
(characteristics)﹕
性味﹕

sweet, bitter, cool.甘
            ，苦，涼。



Channels (meridians) entered:
 
歸經﹕

liver, stomach.
            肝，胃。


Medical functions:
藥理﹕
 

 




Actions 
            & Indications:

主治﹕



            yinxu (yin deficient) with fever, 
            
progressive heat consumption,


            infantile consumption, parasite in digestive tract with bulging 
            abdomen, thirst, weight loss, dry and wilted hair.
            The herb is usually used with
            
ji ne jin, 
shi jun zi, 
            and dang shen 
            for improving digestion, rid of parasites and body weight. 


 陰虛發熱﹐骨蒸劳熱﹐小兒疳熱:小兒食滯或蟲積所致的疳積發熱，腹 
            部膨大，口渴消瘦，毛發焦枯。常與雞內金，使 
            君子 及黨 
            參 等藥同用，以共奏消積殺蟲，健脾療疳之效。
 





Chemical 
            ingredients:

化學成份﹕





fumaric acid

反丁烯二酸 



6,8-di- C- galactopyranos-ylapigenin

6，8-雙-C-半乳糖基芹黄素



6- C- galactopyranosyl- 
                isoscutellerein 


漢黄芩素及6-c- 半乳糖基異野黄
                芩素



Gypsogenin

棉根皂甙元



 

 






Dosage:
用量﹕

3 to10 g.3-10 克。 
 



Samples of formulae:
處方舉例﹕


 

清肝解郁益陰滲濕湯 《廣西中醫藥》
            功能主治：清肝解郁，健脾滲濕。主肝經郁熱，濕蘊於脾。
            白菊花9克，木賊 
            9克，蟬蛻9克，銀柴胡9克，羌活 
9克，生地黃9克，女貞子9克，蒼朮 
9克，白朮9克，防風9克，赤芍 
            6克，菟絲子15克，甘草3克。
            水煎服，每日1劑，日服2次。
 




Modern 
            Research:

現代研究﹕

lowering cholesterol 
            effect有降低膽固醇的作用。




Toxicity 
            & Cautions:

毒素與禁忌﹕

those who are having 
            cold or influenza and those with condition of xue xu (blood deficient) 
            should not use this herb.外感風寒，血虛無熱者忌用。
